# badger: generate badge to be embeded in README or GitHub pages for R repo


```{r echo=FALSE, results="hide", message=FALSE}
library("badger")
```

## Package Version

+ release version
	- syntax: `r ''````
	         badge_bioc_release("ggtree", "green")```
	- badge: `r badge_bioc_release("ggtree", "green")`
+ devel version
	- syntax: `r ''````
            badge_devel("guangchuangyu/ggtree", "blue")```
	- badge: `r badge_devel("guangchuangyu/ggtree", "blue")`

## Download stats

+ Total of total :)
	- syntax: `r ''````
             badge_bioc_download("clusterProfiler", "total", "blue","total")```
	- badge: `r badge_bioc_download("clusterProfiler", "total", "blue",
    "total")`
+ Total of distinct IPs
	- syntax: `r ''````
             badge_bioc_download("clusterProfiler", "total", "blue")```
	- badge: `r badge_bioc_download("clusterProfiler", "total", "blue")`
+ Monthly download of distinct IPs
	- syntax: `r ''````
             badge_bioc_download("clusterProfiler", "month", "green")```
	- badge: `r badge_bioc_download("clusterProfiler", "month", "green")`


## Impact

+ Altmetric score
	- syntax: `r ''````
            badge_altmetric("10533079", "green")```
	- badge: `r badge_altmetric("10533079", "green")`


## Academic
+ DOI
	- syntax: `r ''````
            badge_doi("10.1111/2041-210X.12628", "green")```
	- badge: `r badge_doi("10.1111/2041-210X.12628", "green")`

## Customize badge

+ syntax: `r ''````
          badge_custom("2nd most cited paper", "in OMICS", "blue",
          "http://online.liebertpub.com/action/showMostCitedArticles?journalCode=omi")```
+ badge: `r badge_custom("2nd most cited paper", "in OMICS", "blue",
  "http://online.liebertpub.com/action/showMostCitedArticles?journalCode=omi")`
